verses.roman:
prabhu premāveśe sabāya kaila āliṅgana
premāveśe sabe kare ānanda-krandana

synonyms: prabhu—Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; prema-āveśe—in ecstatic love; sabāya—all of them; kaila āliṅgana—embraced; prema-āveśe—in ecstatic love; sabe kare—all of them did; ānanda-krandana—crying in pleasure.
translation: The Lord was also filled with ecstatic love, and He embraced them all. Out of their love, they began to cry with pleasure.
